response.overview: Gábor takes in his seriously ill mother, and when he returns to his mom’s old apartment, he finds a strange photo of his mother. Since he doesn't get answers to his questions from his mother, he starts searching for the picture. The clues lead to Romania, where it turns out that Gábor's mother worked in a Ceausescu orphanage, from which she escaped one day with a baby...
response.title: Az az egy gyerek
